#### Description
The Government of Canada requires a full range of event management services to support various government departments, agencies, and Crown Corporations. The scope of services includes, but is not limited to:

* Meetings
* Hearings
* Conferences
* Workshops
* Summits
* Consultations
* Round tables
* Award ceremonies
* Galas
* Opening ceremonies

Services will be provided to identified users as follows:

* Any government department, agency, or Crown Corporation listed in Schedules I, I.1, II, III, of the Financial Administration Act, R.S.C., 1985, c. F-11.
* The Communications and Advertising Procurement Directorate on behalf of any government commission or board of inquiry, hearings, or investigative enquiry.
* The Communications and Advertising Procurement Directorate on behalf of any identified users added to the supply arrangement through amendment to Annex F.

#### Key Requirements

* The value of individual contracts awarded under the supply arrangement cannot exceed $2,000,000.00 (including applicable taxes).
* Requirements valued above $2,000,000.00 will not be processed under this supply arrangement.
* The period for awarding contracts under the supply arrangement is from the issuance date to September 30, 2023.

#### Additional Information

* The requirement is subject to the provisions of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
* The requirement will be limited to Canadian goods and/or services.
* A portion of this procurement is set aside under the federal government Procurement Strategy for Aboriginal Business.
